MMOServer.// ListenIP: Listening IP address for the MMO server, default is '*' which represents all IPv4 and IPv6 addresses
MMOServer.// Port: Listening port number for the MMO server
MMOServer.// EnableChat: When true, in-game chat will be enabled
MMOServer.// EventName: World event name send to client (can be used to select ship type after modding WorldEventScoutAttack in client)
MMOServer.// FirstEventTimer: time to start of first world event (battle ship event) after start MMO server
MMOServer.// EventTimer: time between start of world events (battle ship events), set both timer values (EventTimer and FirstEventTimer) to 0 to disable events
MMOServer.// RoomAlerts: List of MMO rooms with alert function. Default empty (not used by SoD), bellow sample config for WoJS, MB and SS.
MMOServer.// alert parameters: alert type, duration [s], minimum time to start [s], maximum time to start [s], redAlertDuration (used for type '1'), number of songs (used for type '3')
MMOServer.// alert types: 1 - Red Alert, 2 - Disco Alert, 3 - Dance Off
MMOServer.// RacingMaxPlayers: maximum players allowed in Thunder Run Racing (no more than 6)
MMOServer.// RacingMinPlayers: minimum players to start Thunder Run Racing
MMOServer.// Authentication: Player authentication mode: Disabled, Optional, RequiredForChat, Required
MMOServer.// Authentication Disabled: authentication is disabled, anyone can connect to mmo
MMOServer.// Authentication Optional: authentication is required only for moderation activities
MMOServer.// Authentication RequiredForChat: authentication is required only for moderation activities and using chat (if chat is enabled)
MMOServer.// Authentication Required: authentication is required to connect to mmo
MMOServer.// ApiUrl: SoDOff API server URL for authentication calls
MMOServer.// BypassToken: Token allowed to connect without authentication
